      • validateXmlAgainsXsdResource

        public void validateXmlAgainsXsdResource(java.lang.String xmlFilePath,

                                  throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                         java.io.IOException
        Validate given xml file again specified xsd resource
        Parameters:
        xmlFilePath - xml file path
        xsd_resource_path - xsd resource
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if xmlFile is not followed xsd
        java.io.IOException - if file path is invalid
